data.text:
@kerpen It’s funny that there is absolutely no mention of the “vaccine” within this guidance.  It’s almost as if they are now finally admitting that 1) it does nothing to prevent you from getting / spreading Covid, and 2) healthy people are at very low risk of severe cases.  
Shocking...
@kristenmag This has immediate effect for private. Public is a whole other ball of wax with collective bargaining etc.
@jbritt5 Employees getting a say in working conditions is good, right?
@kerpen DC Health lifted its mandate, but DCPS is keeping its mandate in place for now. Teachers’ union gets the final say, it seems. https://t.co/g56cV8aq1e

@kerpen Excellent news, but what happened to the “one month” adjustment period they wanted in schools? 

Glad to hear DC ditched that idea and took the expedited approach.
